Author: throwaway862153
Text: I had been on a granola kick, making my own. It was so fucking good. But I had to stop making more because I would portion it out with my yogurt in the morning and then keep snacking on it when I was done in my half asleep state. I'd take one or two bites every ten minutes but it added up so fast. One morning I realized I ate half the batch before lunch.

Author: StephenFrysleftsock
Text: Oh man, granola is the (delicious) bane of my existence.
